title: Action Heavy Metal Music Pack 1
longDescription:
You can listen the preview using this link.



This package consists of 11 tracks and loops for each. In total, there are 71 loops and 11 full tracks in the package. The whole duration of this package, including the loops, is 50 minutes and 37 seconds. All files were set as 16 bit 44100 hz. Each file were set in CUE and WAV format with indicating their tempos. It could be considered as ideal for your trailers, your action games & scenes. All the tracks were recorded with real instruments in the studio environment by the real musicians. There are no specified names for the tracks in this audio package (tracks were named from Song00 to Song10). By this way you are going to be able to rename the tracks according your will. You can find each track inside of the folder that has the track name (i.e. you can find Track01 in the folder named Song01).   


All files were set as 16 bit 44100 hz. Each file were set in CUE and WAV format with indicating their tempos.
